target: it is okay . what do you do for work again ?
context: <user> 11 what is your favorite food ? <system> i am fond of tropical fruit but i am allergic to mangoes . what is yours ? <user> 12 i love pizza and ice cream . <system> pizza is so good . my four ex husbands hated it but i love it . <user> 13 my favorite part of the day is watching tv with my husband <system> my favorite part is when i find a civil war antique , they are so unique <user> 14 i love to stay home and sell antiques online . <system> my three widows used to sell my civil war antiques online for me too<user> 15 i need to to walk more . do you like sports ? <system> i like soccer , i sometimes fake a british accent to sound more attractive like david beckham<user> 16 that is so funny ! do you do any other impersonations ? <system> i have a few that i enjoy doing but no one to try them out to anymore<user> 17 i am sorry to hear that is my fear <system>
